2.「待たせたのう <pc>よ。| わしじゃよ。: Sorry to keep you waiting, <pc>.|It's me.

5.「気がついたか？ お前さんは大ケガをして| このグランゼドーラ城に 運び込まれた: Did you notice? You were brought here to Gran|Zedora Castle with serious injuries.

6.「グランゼドーラ城！| そうだ 私は アジトを抜け出して| 外に 助けを……助け: Gran Zedora Castle?! That's right... I left|the hideout, and... needed to get help...|from outside... ugh...

7.「落ちついて 教えておくれ。| アジトを抜け出した……と言ったが| お前さんは: Calm down and speak slowly. You say you left a|hideout... but who are you, anyway?

8.「私はユーリ……。魔法学の研究者です。| かつてはグランゼドーラ城で 妻と一緒に:
My name is Yuri... and I'm a researcher in the|field of magic study. I used to work here with|my wife, creating medicine to enhance living|
|organisms.

9.「しかし……ある日 紅衣の悪夢団という| 悪しき組織に その研究成果を狙われ|: But, one day... a group calling themselves the|Red Nightmares targeted my research and|kidnapped me, my wife, and my children...

10.「そして 私たちは……紅衣の悪夢団の首領から| 肉体を強化する薬を作るよう 強要: And then... we were forced by their leader to|create a body strengthening medicine... we|had no choice but to comply.

11.「紅衣の悪夢団は ダークドレアムという存在を| 降臨させようと企み その供物を捧: The Red Nightmares are fanatics who will stop|at nothing to bring forth a being called|Nokturnus and use us as sacrifices.

12.「ダークドレアムが降臨してしまったら……| 世界は 崩壊すると言われています。|: It's said that if Nokturnus is brough forth,|the world will come to an end... I felt I|needed to tell someone about this crisis...

13.「そこで私は 妻と相談し ひとりでアジトを| 脱出しました。しかし 追っ手を振り: I discussed it with my wife and then escaped|the hideout alone. However, I got hurt trying|to fight off my pursuers... I'm so pathetic...

14.「もしかして あなた方は 悪夢団について| くわしい事情を 知っているのでは……: Perhaps you know something about that evil|group...? If you do, I have a favor to ask...|Please, take this...

15.<pc>は ユーリから|幻炎の灰（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>: <pc> received|the Flame Ashes (Key Item) from Yuri!<me 60>

16.「その幻炎の灰は 人目から隠された| 紅衣の悪夢団アジトへの道を開くために……|: The Flame Ashes are a secret key that only the|members of the Red Nightmares possess in|order to open the way to their hidden hideout.

17.「幻炎の灰を使って アジトへ……| そこには 悪夢団の首領が……| ダークドレア: Using the Flame Ashes, I went to the hideout|and found their leader... so I could try and|stop the return of Nokturnus...

18.「おい しっかりせんか。| 気を確かに持つのじゃ！: Hey, are you all right? Pull yourself|together!

19.「私を逃がすため 妻は まだアジトに……。| 悪夢団に協力してきた私が こんなこ: My wife is still in that hideout... after|everything I've done for that group, I know|it's selfish of me to ask, but...

20.「どうか……妻を 助け…て……。| お願…い……です……| ………………。: Please... help... my wife...|I'm... begging you...

21.「……どうやら 眠ってしまったようじゃ。| <pc>に 幻炎の灰を託せて| ホッ: Looks like he fell asleep... he must've been|relieved after he entrusted those ashes to|you.

22.「しかし その幻炎の灰を どう使えば| アジトへ行けるか 聞きそびれてしまったの: But, we weren't able to ask him how to use the|ashes to get into the hideout, and we can't|just sit around waiting for him to recover...

23.「……水晶玉よ 我が問いに答えたまえ。| あまたに分かれし 運命の糸をたぐりて|: O crystal ball, answer my plea. Pull the many|threads of fate, and show us the path we|must take!

24.「……レンダーシアの内海に面した灯台じゃ。| 昼も夜も 決して消えることのない|: A lighthouse facing Lendersia's inland sea...|I see a blue light that glows day and night|and never goes out.

25.「その蒼き灯火が 真紅に染まっていく……。| レンダーシアのどこかには 間違いな: Somewhere in Lendersia, that blue light is|turning red... I can surely feel their|presence there.

26.「……占いで見えたのは ここまで。| 蒼き炎を探し出し そこで幻炎の灰を使えば|: ...and that's all I'm able to see for now.|Find the blue flame and use the Flame Ashes|there. That will show you the way.

27.「敵の本拠地では 厳しい戦いになる。| 乗り込む前の準備は おこたらぬようにな。: The battle will be difficult in enemy|territory, so make sure you make necessary|preparations. I'm counting on you!

28.「まあ……！| ケガ人に 無理をさせてはいけませんよ。| どうぞ お引き取りくだ: Hey...! You shouldn't try to force someone|who's injured to talk. I'm sorry, but I have|to ask you to leave.

29.「わしは 館へ戻るとしよう。| 進むべき道に 迷った時は| また 訪ねてくるがい: I'll head back to the house. If you find|yourself lost, please come and see me again.

30.「……もう一度だけ 聞こう。| ユーリは どこへ行った？| 答えろ フルーレ。: I won't ask you again... Where is Yuri?|Answer me right now, Fleuret!

31.「さて 知りませんね……。| たとえ 知っていたとしても| あなたに教えることは: I have no idea... and even if I did, I|wouldn't tell you.

32.「そうか……よかろう。| ならば 仕方ない。: I see... well, no matter.|It seems we have no choice, then.

33.「お前たち夫婦の研究は すでに完成した。| すなわち……もはや 用済みというわけ: Your research is finished. In other words...|You are of no use to use anymore. Yuri will|not be far behind...

34.「……なるほど。我らが主の降臨を知ったユーリは| 外へ 助けを呼びに行ったという: I see... It seems Yuri learned about our Lord,|and went to go find some help... Stay there.|I'll deal with you later.

36.「ようこそ 我らがアジトへ。| 私が 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドだ。: I formally welcome you to our hideout. I am|Buzzread, the leader of the Red Nightmares.

37.「ほう……貴様のことは 知っているぞ。| 近頃 我々の活動を ことごとく邪魔して: Heh... I know who you are. You're the rat who|has been interfering with all of our plans.|You've finally shown yourself.

38.「しかし それも すべて無駄なこと。| 数多の供物を捧げた今 ダークドレアム様の: But, it matters not. We have made many|sacrifices, which means our Lord's return has|nearly arrived.

39.「時は来たれり！| 貴様を 最後の供物として捧げ| 我らが主を ここに降臨させて: It is time! Let us offer you as our final|sacrifice, so that our Lord may descend|here and now!

40.「やめて……！ その薬は 飲まないで！！: No...! Do not use that medicine!

41.「肉体を強化する この秘薬……| どこまでのチカラがあるか 私の身体で| 試すと: This potion that strengthens the body... let's|see how powerful it truly is!

42.「こっ これは……！？| すさまじいチカラが 身体中に みなぎる！| すごい す: I... incredible... I feel so much power...|...inside of me... amazing... simply amazing!|Gahahahaha!!

48.「ふたりで 決めたこととはいえ……| 君をひとり アジトに残して行ったこと| 本: I'm so sorry that I left you here... I should|have never left you alone...

49.「……私たち キズだらけね。| でも それも当然の報いだわ。| こんな化け物を: We're covered in cuts and bruises... but this|is what we deserve. We created this monster...

50.「ああ。でも これで終わるんだ。| 僕らの悪夢は ようやく終わったんだ……。: Yeah... but it's over now. Our nightmare is|finally over...

52.「我らの見続けた 大いなる夢……。| 我が主の降臨……果たさねばならぬ！| なん: The great dream we have had for so long...|The coming of our Lord must be fulfilled!|At any cost! At all costs!!

53.「我が主よ！ 悪夢の暴帝ダークドレアムよ！| 私は 自らを供物として捧げよう。|: My Lord! Nokturnus, the bringer of nightmares!|I offer myself as a sacrifice! My soul|and my body belong to you!!

54.「おお 我が主よ……。| こ…これでも……我が命をもってしても| まだ 降臨され: Ohhh, my Lord... even with... all of this...|Even with... my life... you still have not|descended upon us...?!

55.「我らの夢は かなわぬのか……！| グオォォ……オオオォォッ……！！: Will our dream not come true....?!|Gaaaaaaa....hhhh....!!

56.「首領のバズレッドを失い| これで紅衣の悪夢団は 壊滅するでしょう。| ダークド: With Buzzred gone, the Red Nightmares will be|destroyed. Nokturnus' resurrection seems to|have finally been stopped.

57.「……紅衣の悪夢団に連れ去られ| 強制されて 研究していたとはいえ| 私たちは: Even though we were taken by them and forced|to do research, we still had made a terrible|mistake...

58.「直接 手を汚していなくとも 私たちの研究は| 長年の間 多くの人々の命を危険に: Even indirectly, our research has endangered|and even sacrificed many innocent lives.

59.「……悪夢団の手から どうか逃げ延びてほしいと| かすかな希望を託して 船に乗せ: One of those victims was a child, whom we let|escape on a boat... with a glimmer of hope|that they may escape the Red Nightmares.

60.「この罪は……こんな深い罪は……| 決して 消えることはないでしょう……！: This sin, this horrible sin... the pain will|never go away...!

61.「しかし そんな罪深い私たちを| あなたは キズだらけになりながら| 必死になっ: But as sinful as we were, you still decided to|help us, even putting your life on the line...

62.「あなたに救われた この命に| もしも 意味があるとするならば……| 今度こそ: If my life that you saved is to have any|purpose... it will be to use my research to|help others in need.

63.「それが……研究者の私たちにできる| 唯一の 罪滅ぼしだと思うのです。: I think... that is the only way us researchers|are able to atone.

64.「すべての過ち すべての罪を背負って| 私たちが すべきこと できることを探し|: Even with all of our mistakes and all of our|sins... we promise to find what we can and|should do for the better of the world.

65.「償いきれるはずも ありませんが……| あなたが生かしてくれた 私たちの命にかけ: We can never atone for what I have done... But|we will not break the promise we made to you.|We swear on our lives!

66.「紅衣の悪夢団の暴走を 止めてくださり| 本当に ありがとうございました。私たち:
We truly can't thank you enough for stopping|the Red Nightmares and their schemes. We have|a new journey we'll be going on.|
|Please, take care of yourself.

67.「よう ひさしぶりだな！| あんたに 伝えたいことがあってさ。| どうしても会い: Hey, long time no see! There's something I|wanted to tell you. It's good to see you|again.

68.「なあ 覚えてるか？| 志半ばで死んじまった オレの気持ち。| あんたに託した: Hey, you remember me? Remember how I felt when|I died? I left you my heart...

69.「かつて オレは レンダーシアのとある村で| 家族と共に 平和に暮らしていた。|:
Once upon a time, I lived a peaceful life with|my family in a village in Lendersia. ...until|a mysterious group of men in red cloaks|
|arrived.

70.「オヤジは そいつらの首領に殺され| オフクロも 逃げる途中で 負ったケガが元で: My father was killed by their leader, and|Okuro lost his life from injuries he sustained|on the run.

71.「そう！ 忘れもしない あの赤マント！| 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドこそ|: Yes! I'll never forget that red cape! Buzzred,|the leader of the Redcoat Nightmare Clan, was|the one I swore to kill.

72.「オヤジは ダークドレアムへの供物として狙われ| 村もろとも 消されちまったって: My father was targeted as an offering to|Nokturnus and the whole village was wiped|out....

73.「できるなら この手で 仇を討ちたかったが……| 俺のチカラじゃ かなわなかった:
If I could, I would have avenged him with my|own hands, but I'm not sure I would have had|the strength to do it. I'm really glad you|
|avenged me.

74.「ああ……今なら オレの人生にも| 意味があったんだと思える。| あんたと出会え: Yeah... now I can see that my life had|meaning. I was saved by meeting you.

75.「冥王を倒すだけでなく とうとう| オレの親の仇まで とってくれやがって……。|: Not only did you defeat the Dark Lord, but|you finally avenged my parents... you really|are a great person!

76.「あんたは これからも オレの身体で| 悪しき者たちと 戦い続けていくんだろう。: You will continue to fight the bad guys with|my body. I'm really proud of you for that.

77.「いろいろと 世話になっちまったな。| 礼と言ってはなんだが これをもらってくれ: I've taken care of a lot of things for you. I|want to thank you, and please take this.|I'm sure it will come in handy someday.

79.「さてと……そろそろ お別れだな。| もう 心残りは何もない！| すがすがしい気: Well... it's time to say goodbye. I have no|more regrets! My heart is filled with a|refreshing feeling.

80.「ありがとな エテーネの村の <pc>。| あんたは オレの希望であり……| こ: Thank you, <pc> of Ethene Village.|You are my hope and the hope of Astoltia|itself!

81.「やあ ひさしぶりだね！| あんたに 伝えたいことがあってさ。| どうしても会い: Hey, it's been some time! There's something I|wanted to tell you, so I really needed to see|you again.

82.「ねえ 覚えてるかい？| 志半ばで死んじまった アタシの気持ち。| あんたに託し: Do you remember? The things I felt when my|life was cut short... I left behind with you|my lasting thoughts...

83.「かつて アタシは レンダーシアのとある村で| 家族と共に 平和に暮らしていた。: I used to live peacefully with my family in|a village in Lendersia... until a mysterious|group of red cloaks came to my village.

84.「父さんは そいつらの首領に殺され| 母さんも 逃げる途中で 負ったケガが元で|: Their leader killed my father, and my mother|succumbed to her injuries trying to escape|from them...

85.「そうさ！ 忘れもしない あの赤マント！| 紅衣の悪夢団の首領 バズレッドこそ|: That's right, I'd never forget that red cloak!|That no good Buzzred was the one who I|swore that I would kill.

86.「父さんは ダークドレアムへの供物として狙われ| 村もろとも 消されちまったって: My father was targeted as a sacrifice to|Nokturnus, and the whole village was|destroyed... it was unbearable...

87.「できれば この手で 仇を討ちたかったけど……| アタシのチカラじゃ かなわなか: I wanted to avenge him with my own hands, if|possible... but I don't think I could do it.|I am happy you were able to do it in my stead.

88.「ああ……今なら アタシの人生にも| 意味があったんだって そう思えるんだ。|: Yes... I can now see that my life had meaning.|Meeting you saved my life.

89.「冥王を倒すだけでなく とうとう| アタシの親の仇まで とってくれちゃって……。: Not only did you defeat the Netherlord, but|you avenged my parents, too...|You truly are an amazing person!

90.「あんたは これからも アタシの身体で| 悪しき者たちと 戦い続けていくんだろう: I know that you'll keep fighting off evil|using my body. I really... I really am proud|of that.

91.「いろいろと 世話になっちまったね。| 礼と言ってはなんだが これをもらってよ。: You really have a lot of things to take care|of, don't you? Please take this as my thanks.|I'm sure one day it will be of some use.

93.「さてと……そろそろ お別れだね。| もう 心残りは何もない！| すがすがしい気: Well, then... it's about time to say goodbye.|I no longer have any regrets! My heart can|finally breathe a sigh of relief.

94.「ありがとう エテーネの村の <pc>。| あんたは アタシの希望であり……|: Thank you, <pc> of Ethene Village.|You are my hope... and the very hope of|Astoltia itself!

95.「やあ どうも。ひさしぶり！| 君に 伝えたいことがあって| どうしても会いたく: Hey there! Long time no see! I had something|I really wanted to tell you, so I came here|to see you.

96.「君は 覚えてるかな？| 孤児院で育った僕が 本当の両親を探して| 旅に出ようと: Do you remember? I grew up in an orphanage,|and just as I was about to go out and try to|find my real parents, they died...

97.「僕の両親は きっと とんでもないトラブルに| 巻き込まれ 僕を手放したんだ。だ: My parents must've gotten into some trouble or|something, so they had to give me away. That's|why I asked you to help me find 'em.

98.「顔も声も 覚えていなかったけれど| あの人たちが 泣いた時……わかったんだ。|: I don't remember how they looked or what they|sounded like, but when they cried... I knew.|Yuri and Fleuret were definitely my parents.

99.「僕を逃がすため かすかな希望を託して| 仕方なく 海へ……そうだったんだね。|: So that's what happened... with a glimmer of|hope in their hearts, they let me go, out into|the sea... Mom... Dad... thank you.

100.「……確かに 悪夢団に協力していた ふたりは| 償いきれないほどの罪を 犯したか: They probably committed more crimes doing|stuff with that bad group than they could ever|hope to be forgiven for.

101.「でも 誰が責めても 僕だけはふたりの味方さ。| 今度こそ 人の役に立つ研究をす: It doesn't matter whose fault it is... I'll|always be on their side. I'm so proud of them|deciding to use their research for good!

102.「<pc>。僕の願い通り 両親を探しだして| 悪夢団から救ってくれて ありがとう: Thank you for finding my parents and saving|them from this horrible mess. I really, really|can't thank you enough, <pc>.

103.「でも 君は 僕の両親だけでなく| この世界をも 救おうとしているんだね……。: But you're trying to save the entire world,|not just my parents...

104.「その夢……陰ながら 応援させてもらうよ。| 今までの 感謝の気持ちを込めて|: I'll always have your back, supporting that|dream. I hope you'll accept this small thanks|for all the things you've done for me.

106.「さあ そろそろ お別れの時間だ。| さようなら……もうひとりの <pc>。|: Well, unfortunately it's time to say goodbye.|Goodbye, other <pc>.|I really am glad to have met you.

107.「これからも 大切な両親と……| 君という希望が息づく アストルティアの大地を|: I'll keep watchin' over all of Astoltia...|Where you and my dear folks continue to|live on with hope!

108.「やっほー！ ひっさしぶり～！| 私ね あなたに 伝えたいことがあって| どうし: Hey, it's been a while! I really wanted to see|you and tell you something, so... I came here.

109.「あなたは 覚えてくれてたかな？| 孤児院で育った私が パパとママを探して| 旅: I wonder if you remember? I told you I grew up|in an orphanage and just as I was about to|go and find my parents, they died.

110.「パパとママは きっと とんでもないトラブルに| 巻き込まれて 私を手放したはず: Mom and Dad must have gotten into some real|trouble, so they gave me up. That's why I|asked you to find them for me.

111.「顔も声も 覚えてなかったけど| あの人たちが 泣いた時……わかったんだ。| 私: I didn't remember what they looked or sounded|like, but when I heard them crying... I knew.|Yuri is my dad, and Fleuret is my mom!

112.「私を逃がすため かすかな希望を託して| 仕方なく 海へ……そうだったんだね。|: So that's what happened... with a glimmer of|hope in their hearts, they let me go, out into|the sea... Mom... Dad... thank you.

113.「確かに パパとママは 悪夢団に協力したりして| すっごく悪いこと しちゃったか: It is true that they did some awful things,|having to cooperate with that bad group|and all...

114.「でも 誰が責めたって 私だけはふたりの味方！| 今度こそ 人の役に立つ研究をす: It doesn't matter whose fault it is... I'll|always be on their side! It's so cool they|decided to use their research for good!

115.「<pc>。私のお願いを聞いてくれて……| パパとママを救ってくれて ありがとう: Thank you for doing me this favor and saving|my folks, <pc>... I don't think|I can ever thank you enough.

116.「でも あなたは 私のパパとママだけじゃなくて| 世界まるごと 救っちゃうつもり: You're not just gonna save my parents, but the|whole world, right?

117.「その夢……全力で 応援しちゃう！| 今までの お礼の気持ちも込めて| これは: I'll do my best to always support that dream!|I want to give you this present as way of|saying thank you. Please take it!

119.「さーてと。そろそろ お別れの時間っぽい。| じゃあね……もうひとりの <pc>: Well... looks like it's about time to say|goodbye. I'm really glad I was able to meet|you. Bye bye, <pc>...

120.「これからも 大好きなパパとママを……| あなたという希望が息づく アストルティ: I'll always love you, Mom and Dad... and I'll|always be watching over you, too!

121.<center>まだだ……。まだ 足りぬ…………。: Not yet... It's not yet enough...
